snippet.title: SNES Longplay [283] Mickey and Donald - Magical Adventure 3 (2-Players)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Stenio_Henrique & xRavenXP

Longplay of Mickey and Donald - Magical Adventure 3 (fan translation name). The final game in the Magical Quest trilogy was released for the Super Famicom only in Japan. It was later re-released for the Game Boy Advance, which was the first version of the game to be released outside Japan. In Disney's Magical Quest 3 Starring Mickey & Donald, Mickey Mouse & Donald Duck try to save Donald's nephews from King Pete. It features four outfits and seven levels. Unlike the two earlier game in the series, an outfit now behaves different depending on if Mickey or Donald wears it. Is a epic game, with great soundtrack and very good graphics.

Donald's nephews were kidnapped by Baron Pete after hiding in the attic and took a mysterious book, this book has imprisoned them in Storyland and it's up to Mickey and Donald find Huey, Dewey and Louie after a fairy transport them to this magical world. Along the way our heroes receive special clothes of various characters from Storyland.

Town Harvest Fair: 05:18
Fungi Forest: 44:53
Sandy Mountain: 54:43
The Airship: 01:06:00
Shell Ocean: 01:17:04
Snowflake Mountain: 1:25:30
King Pete's Palace: 1:31:17

Played in 2 players, in Hard level and in order to show the extended and true dialogues of both characters in each scene.
These dialogues make more sense with two players playing this wonderful game.
*Stenio plays with Mickey (Player 1)
*Me (xRavenXP) plays with Donald (Player 2)

Note: We spented many time in first stage to get coins to buy our updates to Knight Armors and Magic Clothes.   ;) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
